resources.string: Hello World!nAdd Introduction about app at first when user open very first time. Describing app features and how to use app and so on.
Hi! I am Galileo, your virtual guide to discovering your workplace.
I can help you get to know the teams around you and the cool things they\'re working with.
Find your way around the office on any floor. Quickly get to the sports room, kitchen or meeting rooms.
Don\'t know where you can find a colleague? Use the employee locator and our AR guide will lead you stragiht to their desk.
Come along on a journey with us to explore Endava!
Hi! I am Galileo, your virtual guide to discovering our company.
Let me take you on a tour to meet some of our top clients from industries like finance, healthcare, retail and telecommunications.
Find your way around the office on any floor, in any Endava building around the world.
Get to know some of our teams and take a look at the technologies our developers have in the toolbelt.
Come along on a journey with us to explore your future business partner!
Hi! I am Galileo, your virtual guide to discovering our company.
We invite you to explore this floor, to take a look at the facilities our developers have at their disposal.
Feel free to walk around and get to know some of our teams and take a look at the technologies our developers work with.

Come along on a journey with us to explore your prospect future workplace!
